replies.body:
Finally, some smart moves on ADC itemization.  ADC's need a steraks shield so badly in a bursty meta.  Frozen mallet yasuo will suffer, but that's all for the greater good.

What I cant work out is, why we think shojin isn't going to give us a blatantly overpowered permanent helicopter Jax, Alpha once per second Yi, and Riven with no CD on anything if she has anything to hit.  

The item seems to drive several skirmishers from decentish to broken.
blatantly overpowered Jax and Riven, this was more so the case with old ER buddy
The old ER was less stat efficient for them, they really didnt want that mana, but they can use the HP.
Essence reaver was already a thing and personally spear of shojin is a bit worse generally (better in certain matchups as it contains hp instead of mana and mana on hit)

Yes, but this will give the right champions far more CD reduction than old Essence reaver  did.  Admittedly at the cost of an ulti, but Jax can fairly freely ulti, and Yi tends to do so at the start of a fight anyway.  It would be a big sacrifice on Riven, but possibly worth it if it his someone, in order to play in urf mode for a while.

Renekton is another fairly likely user, as he also wants to ult at the start of an engagement and has CDs that he really wants back, and fast.  Better on him(statwise) than old essence reaver at its peak.
I'm not gonna lie, what pissed me off is that they said Infinity Edge was "updated". It has been reverted* gosh darn it!

I feel happier playing League when I see old items return. It really warms my mood towards the game.

Also, full ad garen will be worse than ever with these updated items lol
When is the Zoe VS Fizz event coming out?

How about instead of penalizing supports, if you have kleptomancy, you can't buy a gold generation item. Fucking simple. Stop nerfing support items for supports when they're exploited by solo laners. Remove the exploit without nerfing support.

New adc changes can't wait to try them 10 games later tricked again it's another fucking nerf. Yay more damage all you need to do is lose your 1 item spike, pay out the nose for ie and a zeal item with no damage to actually get some kills to accelerate. Honestly this shits been wrecked for months now how hard is it to test changes before implementing.
Wow, so just pick bruisers and gg, don't play anything else. Good work Riot, keep digging your own grave.
personally i could forgive the aatrox and akali berfs but messing up infinity edge like that isnt right

If Zyras plants are getting attention and nerfs can we look at how they get 1 shot AoE abilites?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} quite often you can blow your ult with bunch of plants then some light AoE insta wipes them all.

I cant wait to try the new adc changes they seem real good.

not happy with the confusing irelia changes she still seems like a 100% ban every single game for me
Riot is stupid. If they continue with these irational changes they will literally dig LOL its grave.
